name: Streets of Decay
description:
A City-Crawling Companion for Mörk Borg, Sölitary Defilement, and Alöne in the Crowd!

This generator provides gives you a quick and dirty way to generate encounters based on the city-crawling oracles in 1d10+5's Alöne in the Crowd (exclusive to backers of the Sölitary Defilement Kickstarter). Further tables and advice for shops and encounters can be found within the pages of Alöne in the Crowd. Alöne in the Crowd is still exclusive to KS backers, but will be released as a digital paid download version before the end of the year.

Streets of Decay also generates street names and four stock NPCs with names and stats (e.g. for pub patrons, people encountered on the streets etc). It also pairs really well with the additional city tables included in the recently released Mörk Borg GM Screen!

Need a name and some prompts for the settlement you are exploring? Check out Settlements of the Damned, too!

Streets of Decay is an independent production by 1d10+5 and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License. MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
